greenActions.title: Plant Trees
greenActions.description: Plant native trees to support biodiversity and improve air quality.

greenActions.title: Recycle Paper
greenActions.description: Collect and recycle household paper to reduce waste and save resources.

greenActions.title: Bike to Work
greenActions.description: Use a bicycle instead of a car for daily commuting to lower CO2 emissions.

greenActions.title: Save Water
greenActions.description: Collect rainwater and use it for gardening to conserve drinking water.

communalGoals.title: Tree Planting
communalGoals.description: Plant 100 trees in the community park.

trades.title: Solar Panel Discount
trades.description: Get a discount on solar panel installation to increase renewable energy use.

trades.title: Eco-Friendly Products
trades.description: Trade points for eco-friendly household products and reduce plastic usage.
